name: Path of the Pogo
description:
What's more unstable than a pogo stick? Well, maybe it's a man who tries to navigate a dank and dangerous cave while ON a pogo stick!

It's finnicky. It's brutal. It's punishing.  It has a jamming song on loop.

Welcome to Path of the Pogo!

CONTROLS

Use A and D to balance/tilt on your pogo stick.

Hold down SPACE to charge a pogo jump.

Release SPACE to pogo jump!

HINTS

Lava, spinning saw blades and swinging axes should probably be avoided.  I mean, what are they even doing in a cave anyway?
